data.name: CodeMobile
data.description: CodeMobile is a UK developer conference that has been created by developers who love creating apps in the mobile space. It’s an opportunity to network, share ideas and collaborate. The conference has two tracks, one focussed on iOS development, the other on Android.

data.name: Mobile
data.description: iOS and Android mobile design and development conferences.

relatedRecords.name: Salt Lake DevFest
relatedRecords.description: Salt Lake DevFest is our annual event showcasing the incredible developer talent located here in Salt Lake. We’ll have speakers and workshops from a variety of speakers covering various tech topics. More info to come!
